--------------EE607EB0245EC901AB31D049 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit grobe@gmx.net wrote: > So, is it possible to use Kodak targets with radiance, or do you know where > I get > Macbeth colorchecker in Germany? Try Edmund Industrie Optik GmbH Greschbachstr 23 76229 Karlsruhe 0721-62737-30 / -50 Fax their new catalogue sells them for EUR 102.96 (number U37-756) for others: it's the local branch of "Edmund Scientific" www.edmundoptics.com cheers Peter pab-opto, Freiburg, Germany, www.pab-opto.de --------------EE607EB0245EC901AB31D049 Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit grobe@gmx.net wrote:
So, is it possible to use Kodak targets with radiance, or do you know where
I get
Macbeth colorchecker in Germany?
Try
Edmund Industrie Optik GmbH
Greschbachstr 23
76229 Karlsruhe
0721-62737-30 / -50 Fax
their new catalogue sells them for EUR 102.96 (number U37-756)

for others: it's the local branch of "Edmund Scientific"
    www.edmundoptics.com

cheers
Peter 

-- 
 pab-opto, Freiburg, Germany, www.pab-opto.de
